./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_decode.v Cov: 100% 

   1: /**
   2:  *  bsg_decode.v
   3:  *
   4:  *  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RvnkAtWcKYg
   5:  */
   6: 
   7: module bsg_decode #(parameter num_out_p="inv")
   8: (
   9:   input [`BSG_SAFE_CLOG2(num_out_p)-1:0] i
  10:   ,output logic [num_out_p-1:0] o
  11: );
  12: 
  13:   if (num_out_p == 1) begin
  14:     // suppress unused signal warning
  15:     wire unused = i;
  16:     assign o = 1'b1;
  17:   end
  18:   else begin
  19:     assign o = (num_out_p) ' (1'b1 << i);
  20:   end
  21: 
  22: endmodule
  23:
